name: Decimoid [PC & Web]
description:
Decimoids live on small planetoids and have a life span of 10 seconds.

So they have an urgent need to mate and make the next generation, thankfully they have evolved to use the heart fruit as a mating tool.

To mate they simply pick up a heartfruit and throw it to another Decimoid.

They can also use the spikey fruit as a weapon.

Controls : Mouse look WASD move LMB throw

Or you can play it online here Decimoid Online
